name: Amane Adventures
description:
THE GAME IS BEST ENJOYED IN FULLSCREEN.

Amane Adventures follows the journey of Amane, who sets out to defeat the pollution slimes who have invaded his hometown. Equipped with his trusty ExcalipHer and  Water testing kit, guide him on his journey to collect water data in order to defeat the pollution slimes once and for all!

Features: 

- Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to Jump.

- "C" key to attack with your ExcalipHer.

- "X" key to test the water with your water testing kit.

- Left Mouse Button to reset your position. 

  • Music "Groovy Tower" by Waterflame.

         https://www.waterflame.com 

  • Banner Art by Buisso
